content.text: Hi there! How are you today?
Hello! I'm doing well, thank you for asking! How are you doing this evening?
I'm doing well, too! I'm just hanging out, relaxing before the weekend.
That sounds fun! I'm doing some last-minute packing before I head to college tomorrow.
Oh, that's exciting! Where are you going to college?
I'm going to the University of Texas at Austin!
That's a great school! I'm sure you'll have a great time there.
Thank you! I'm really excited to start this new chapter in my life.
Well, I'm sure you'll do great! Good luck with everything!
Thank you! I appreciate it!
You're welcome!
So, tell me a little bit about yourself!
Sure! Well, I'm a stay-at-home mom of two young children. I love to cook, bake, and garden. I'm also a big fan of reading, music, and movies.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to cook and bake, too. I'm also a big fan of reading and movies.
That's great! We should definitely talk about our favorite recipes sometime.
I'd love that!
So, what are you looking forward to most about starting college?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people, learning new things, and having new experiences.
Those are all great things to look forward to! I'm sure you'll have a lot of fun in college.
Thanks! I'm really excited to start this new chapter in my life.
I'm sure you'll do great
